languages.text: "Если для безопасности этих владений я сочту необходимым казнить любое лицо и заменить его двойником-марионеткой, обратить в пепел его владения, предать смерти его слуг — я имею право так поступить. Потому что угрозы, от которых защищаю Простор я, экстраординарны и оправдывают самые жестокие меры. Добро пожаловать в мой мир, в котором слова "излишняя строгость" являются забавным оксюмороном".

"If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."
languages.original_text: "Если для безопасности этих владений я сочту необходимым казнить любое лицо и заменить его двойником-марионеткой, обратить в пепел его владения, предать смерти его слуг — я имею право так поступить. Потому что угрозы, от которых защищаю Простор я, экстраординарны и оправдывают самые жестокие меры. Добро пожаловать в мой мир, в котором слова "излишняя строгость" являются забавным оксюмороном".

traits.locale_text: "If I find it a necessity for the safety of these territories to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. For the threats I protect the Koronus against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where the words 'excessive severity' are a humorous oxymoron."

"If I find it a necessity for the safety of these territories to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. For the threats I protect the Koronus against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where the words 'excessive severity' are a humorous oxymoron."

"If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Koronus against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

"If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Koronus against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

"If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

languages.text: 「これら領地の治安のために、個人を処刑して代わりの傀儡にすげ替え、王国を灰と化し、従者を処刑する必要があるならば…私には実行する権利はあるのだ。エクスパンスを守るために私が立ち向かわねばならない脅威は途方もなく巨大で、かつてないほど凶悪な手段をとってくる。それが私の世界。『やり過ぎる』ことなどない、単純な世界だ」
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: 「これら領地の治安のために、個人を処刑して代わりの傀儡にすげ替え、王国を灰と化し、従者を処刑する必要があるならば…私には実行する権利はあるのだ。エクスパンスを守るために私が立ち向かわねばならない脅威は途方もなく巨大で、かつてないほど凶悪な手段をとってくる。それが私の世界。『やり過ぎる』ことなどない、単純な世界だ」

languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

languages.text: “为了这片疆域的安全，我有权做任何必要的事情。哪怕是要处决某个人，将他的王朝夷为平地，将他的仆从赶尽杀绝，再换上一个更容易操控的傀儡，也是没问题的。科罗努斯扩区正面临前所未有的重大威胁，因此我有理由采取最严酷的手段来确保它的安全。欢迎来到我掌权的世界，在这里，我做什么都不算‘过分’。”
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: “为了这片疆域的安全，我有权做任何必要的事情。哪怕是要处决某个人，将他的王朝夷为平地，将他的仆从赶尽杀绝，再换上一个更容易操控的傀儡，也是没问题的。科罗努斯扩区正面临前所未有的重大威胁，因此我有理由采取最严酷的手段来确保它的安全。欢迎来到我掌权的世界，在这里，我做什么都不算‘过分’。”

languages.text: «Si para proteger estos territorios me veo obligado a ejecutar a una persona y sustituirla por un títere, a reducir sus dominios a cenizas y a exterminar a sus sirvientes, tengo derecho a hacerlo. Las amenazas contra las que protejo la Extensión son extraordinarias y justifican los medios más extremos. Le doy la bienvenida a mi mundo, donde el "pasarse de la raya" no existe».
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: «Si para proteger estos territorios me veo obligado a ejecutar a una persona y sustituirla por un títere, a reducir sus dominios a cenizas y a exterminar a sus sirvientes, tengo derecho a hacerlo. Las amenazas contra las que protejo la Extensión son extraordinarias y justifican los medios más extremos. Le doy la bienvenida a mi mundo, donde el "pasarse de la raya" no existe».

languages.text: « Si, pour le bien de ce secteur, j'estime nécessaire d'exécuter quelqu'un, de le remplacer par une marionnette, de réduire son royaume en cendres et de mettre ses serviteurs à mort, je suis parfaitement dans mon droit. L'ampleur des menaces qui planent sur les Étendues justifie le recours à de telles extrémités. Bienvenue dans mon monde, où l'expression "aller trop loin" n'existe tout simplement pas. »
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: « Si, pour le bien de ce secteur, j'estime nécessaire d'exécuter quelqu'un, de le remplacer par une marionnette, de réduire son royaume en cendres et de mettre ses serviteurs à mort, je suis parfaitement dans mon droit. L'ampleur des menaces qui planent sur les Étendues justifie le recours à de telles extrémités. Bienvenue dans mon monde, où l'expression "aller trop loin" n'existe tout simplement pas. »

languages.text: "Wenn ich es für die Sicherheit dieser Territorien für notwendig halte, ein beliebiges Individuum hinzurichten und durch eine Marionette zu ersetzen, sein Reich einzuäschern und seine Diener zu töten – dann habe ich das Recht dazu. Die Bedrohungen, vor denen ich die Ausdehnung schütze, sind außergewöhnlich und rechtfertigten die harschesten Mittel. Willkommen in meiner Welt, wo 'zu weit gehen' schlichtweg nicht existiert!"
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich es für die Sicherheit dieser Territorien für notwendig halte, ein beliebiges Individuum hinzurichten und durch eine Marionette zu ersetzen, sein Reich einzuäschern und seine Diener zu töten – dann habe ich das Recht dazu. Die Bedrohungen, vor denen ich die Ausdehnung schütze, sind außergewöhnlich und rechtfertigten die harschesten Mittel. Willkommen in meiner Welt, wo 'zu weit gehen' schlichtweg nicht existiert!"

languages.text: "Eğer ki bu bölgelerin güvenliği adına bir bireyi idam etmenin ve onu bir kukla ile değiştirmenin, diyarını küle çevirmenin ve hizmetkârlarını katletmenin gerekli olduğu kanısına varırsam bunu yapmaya hakkım vardır. Enginlik'i koruduğum tehditler muazzam olup en uç yöntemleri bile haklı gösterirler. Dünyama, 'çok ileri gitmek' diye bir şeyin olmadığı bu yere hoş geldin."
languages.original_text: "If, for the security of these territories, I find it necessary to execute any individual and replace them with a puppet counterpart, turn their realm to ash, and put their servants to death — I have the right to do so. The threats I protect the Expanse against are extraordinary and justify the harshest means. Welcome to my world, where 'going too far' simply doesn't exist."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer ki bu bölgelerin güvenliği adına bir bireyi idam etmenin ve onu bir kukla ile değiştirmenin, diyarını küle çevirmenin ve hizmetkârlarını katletmenin gerekli olduğu kanısına varırsam, bunu yapmaya hakkım vardır. Enginlik'i koruduğum tehditler muazzamdırlar ve en uç yöntemleri bile haklı gösterirler. Dünyama hoş geldin. 'Çok ileri gitmek' diye bir şeyin olmadığı yere."
